title: About
text: DEVDIVA started in 1999 as an aspirational moniker. I’ve grown with the web over the years, graduating from brochureware to web applications to social networking sites to services-based application ecosystems. DEVDIVA is my ever-evolving personal and professional site.

title: About
text:
About Me
I am a technology consultant in San Francisco, CA.
Previous projects include work for Fortune 500 companies, social networking startups, charitable organizations, network service providers, email marketing and interactive design agencies.

title: About
text:
Consulting
I do a spot of consulting from time-to-time. Typical engagements are for information architecture, web site design, development and deployment.

title: A look at Quarto…
text:
A nice (newish) option for data notebooks and technical publishing.
Announced a year ago, Quarto is a pretty tidy publishing system and the evolution of R Markdown.

An open-source scientific and technical publishing system

Markdown (qmd)

Mermaid
Graphviz
R
Python
Observable JS

Code block rendering


window.alert('hi');






<a href="#">foo</a>
.foo { 
  color: "#000";
  width: 100px;
}
A wide varity of publishing options based on established/stable tech (Pandoc, R Markdown, Knittr). Interesting options for publishing to wiki’s and extension system for customization

documents like pdf, epub, doc
html (as a website, a reveljs presentation, etc.)
markdown (some magic here.)

Resources:

https://quarto.org/
https://quarto.org/docs/guide/
https://quarto.org/docs/extensions/creating.html
https://posit.co/blog/announcing-quarto-a-new-scientific-and-technical-publishing-system/

title: One small goal, achieved.
text:
Most of my writing never sees the light of day. This site update is an effort to change that (at least a little bit).
For me, small goals set without any consequence are how I achieve some of my bigger personal goals. This simple framing of perspective let’s me give myself the grace to move fast and slow.
So, let’s see where this goes…
